page.title: 05FAMILIES
page.content: "My Dad was born in Ascot.He is 34 and his favourite pub is the Cannie Man.He takes me there and gives me money for sweets.I sit in the car while he goes in.We both like chips.He takes me swim ming but I sometimes get annoyed with him for forgetting the dates for Cub camp. Mum is 31 and takes me lots of places.She helped Dad pay for France. She makes up jokes and makes me laugh. She brings things home for me.My brother is 8 and was born in Ascot.His favourite football team is Manchester Utd. He likes chips and orange.My sister was born in Ascot at 11am.She likes Sindies and chips.I was born in Ascot and I'm 10.My birthday is in January and I like cars.I like mack- eral(which I ate at Cub camp),turkey, chicken,rump steak,oranges,bananas, apples,carrots,peas,ice cream & cake." {DARREN TODD, 10, Pines Junior
